results.content:
Excellent course. I have created my website and will be ready to publish/launch it soon. I have learned so many new things and I found this course to be extremely creative. This course really encouraged me to dig deeper and beyond. I created my own graphics, installed plugins that were not mentioned in the course, and am looking forward to launching it. 

Jason Allen has been an amazing lecturer and has responded to all my difficult questions, even on Christmas eve at I think about 3am in the morning! Thanks Jason for your commitment and I look forward to showing you how you have helped me.

Cheers

Wayne Liesching - South Africa

results.content: The course is good for learning manipulation of wordpress themes and getting a website up and functioning quickly.  I learned a lot and now have a site up for my band.
results.content_html: The course is good for learning manipulation of wordpress themes and getting a website up and functioning quickly. I learned a lot and now have a site up for my band.

results.content: Straight forward approach to get up and running using Wordpress. I enjoyed following along as it covered just what was needed to make things function as intended. Thanks again cheers ...
results.content_html: Straight forward approach to get up and running using Wordpress. I enjoyed following along as it covered just what was needed to make things function as intended. Thanks again cheers ...

results.content: Excellent course for Artists and Musicians who dont want to code or hire it out. I have been studying Web Design to make better sites for myself. I cant say enough about this class. It eliminates the need to code. For Artists who just want to create their music or art and get a good web site up and working quickly and dont have money to spend on a designer,  this is awesome. You do have control over look and feel and functionality. Unless you really need to do something beyond the basic profile artists page there is no reason NOT to take this course.
